ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ($Profile.Name != 'Data Loader Profile' && RecordType.Name == 'Distributor GPP 1.0' && Text(Accreditation_Type__c) == 'Product' && ((Text(Accreditation_Level__c) != 'Distributor') || Text( Pricing_Level_Override__c) != 'Distributor'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only the following values are allowed: Distributor
